name: LUMENZ - GMTK Game Jam 2021
description:
LUMENZ

Lumenz is a open world platforming adventure game with fast movement mechanics, focused on exploration and survival in the dark. 

In order to survive in the world of Lumenz, you must obtain the many light sources that are hidden in many places across the map. These light sources expand your own light source, increasing the amount of time you have to live.

Have fun and enjoy!

A more version with bug fixes and more content is in the works.  Keep an eye out for it :)

This game was made by the bros, Elliot and Evan.
